name: socorro-webapp
//browserComment: The 'browser' key indicates to ESBuild that we're client-side and not to install listed packages
This is necessitated by 'metrics-graphics' source code, which is very old and triggers build errors with listed packages.
author: Mozilla

scripts.build: rm -rf static/* && npm run copy:images && node esbuild && npm run build:collectstatic
scripts.build:collectstatic: TOOL_ENV=True ./manage.py collectstatic --noinput -i crashstats/*.css -i api/*.css -i documentation/*.css -i profile/*.css -i signature/*.css -i status/*.css -i supersearch/*.css -i tokens/*.css -i topcrashers/*.css
